communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all documents, communication and memos, including cross-referenced records, relating to Joseph Kordan. To aid in the expedition of this request I am providing the following information.

Name: Joseph Kordan
Also known as: Joe Kordan; Joseph Kordonsky; Jossel Kordansky; Jossel Kardonsky; Jossel Kordonsky; Yossel Kordansky; Yossel Kardonsky; Yossel Kordonsky
Date of birth: March 15 1891 (OR 1890)
Place of birth: Starokonstantinov, Russian Empire
Address: 1109 Biddle St, St. Louis, Missouri
Social Security Number: 551-03-0329
Date of death: November 1 1960
Place of death: Los Angeles, California

I am also providing the following documents to aid in identification:

- Newspaper article, ‘Man Held on Warrant Charging Misuse of Mails by Threats', St. Louis Globe-Democrat, January 16 1921. Please note that the article incorrectly records the individual's age as '39'.
- Newspaper article, ‘MAN ACCUSED OF THREAT TO KILL TWO WITNESSES', St. Louis Globe-Democrat, January 19 1921.
- Declaration of Intention, February 13 1939.
- Certificate of Death, November 3 1960. Please note that the certificate incorrectly records the individual's date of birth as 'March 5 1890'.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Dawn Kordan
